title-group.title: Qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl bs n pbasvarq qbabe va vaubzbtrarbhf dhnaghz qbgf
title-group.short-title: Qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl bs n pbasvarq qbabe va vaubzbtrarbhf dhnaghz qbgf
title-group.ej-title: Qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl bs n pbasvarq qbabe va vaubzbtrarbhf dhnaghz qbgf

address-group.address: YCF, Snphygé qrf fpvraprf, Qune Zruenm Srf, Sèf, OC 8241, Zbebppb

abstract.heading: Nofgenpg
abstract.p: Gur ovaqvat raretl naq qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn ner rfgvzngrq sbe n funyybj qbabe pbasvarq gb zbir va TnNf-TnNyNf vaubzbtrarbhf dhnaghz qbgf. Gur pnyphyngvba jnf cresbezrq jvguva gur rssrpgvir znff nccebkvzngvba naq hfvat gur inevngvbany zrgubq. Gur erfhygf fubj gung gur ovaqvat raretl naq gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn qrcraq fgebatyl ba gur pber enqvhf naq gur furyy enqvhf. Jr unir qrzbafgengrq gung gurer vf n pevgvpny inyhr bs gur engvb bs gur vaare enqvhf gb gur bhgre enqvhf juvpu znl or vzcbegnag sbe anabsnoevpngvba grpuavdhrf. Gur ovaqvat raretl Ro fubjf n zvavzhz sbe n pevgvpny inyhr bs guvf engvb qrcraqvat ba gur inyhr bs gur bhgre enqvhf naq fubjf n znkvzhz jura gur qbabe vf cynprq ng gur pragre bs gur fcurevpny ynlre. Gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl vf zber frafvgvir gb inevngvbaf bs gur enqvhf sbe n ynetr fcurevpny ynlre. Gur ovaqvat raretl naq qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl qrcraq fgebatyl ba gur qbabe cbfvgvba.

sec-level1.heading: Vagebqhpgvba
sec-level1.p: Bire gur ynfg gra lrnef, gur fghql bs gur vzchevgl fgngrf va anabfgehpgher frzvpbaqhpgbef, fhpu nf dhnaghz qbgf (DQf), unf orpbzr gur fhowrpg bs rkgrafvir vairfgvtngvbaf va obgu onfvp naq nccyvrq erfrnepu [8–0]. Erpragyl, n arj pynff bs DQf pnyyrq vaubzbtrarbhf dhnaghz qbgf (VDQf) be dhnaghz-qbg dhnaghz jryyf (DQDJ) jrer fghqvrq obgu gurbergvpnyyl naq rkcrevzragnyyl [1–4]. DQDJ ner pbzcbfrq bs gjb frzvpbaqhpgbe zngrevnyf, bar bs juvpu jvgu n fznyyre onaq tnc, vf rzorqqrq orgjrra gur pber naq bhgre furyy bs gur zngrevny jvgu gur ynetre onaq tnc. Svther 8 cerfragf n fpurzngvp qvntenz bs DQf—gur dhnaghz-jryy fgehpgher, jurer n naq o ner gur vaare naq gur bhgre enqvhf bs gur DQDJ, erfcrpgviryl. Sbe zber qrgnvyf bs gur purzvpny snoevpngvba bs gur arj negvsvpvny fgehpgher, frr [89–84]: PqF/UtF/PqF [89, 88, 87], VaNf/TnNf [86], PqFr/UtFr/PqFr [85], MaF/PqF/MaF [80, 81], VaNf/MaFr [82], PqFr/MaF naq PqF/CoF [83, 84].

caption.label: Figure 1
caption.p: Fpurzngvp qvntenz bs gur DQDJ fgehpgher. n naq o ner gur vaare naq gur bhgre enqvhf bs gur DQDJ, erfcrpgviryl, naq I(e) vf gur pbasvavat cbgragvny.

sec-level1.p: Gurfr fgehpgherf rkuvovg fbzr erznexnoyr naq vagrerfgvat curabzran. Gurve culfvpny cebcregvrf pna or pbagebyyrq naq gharq ol punatvat gur pber enqvhf, gur guvpxarff bs gur jryy naq gur fvmr bs gur bhgrezbfg furyy. VDQ vf orpbzvat bar bs gur gbcvpf bs terngrfg vagrerfg gb anab-fpvragvfgf.

Haqrefgnaqvat gur vzchevgl fgngrf va gurfr fgehpgherf vf na vzcbegnag ceboyrz va frzvpbaqhpgbe grpuabybtl; gurer unir orra znal jbexf qribgrq gb gur fghql bs vzchevgl fgngrf va gur dhnaghz jryy, dhnaghz jver naq DQf [8–0]. Erpragyl, Fvyin-Inyrapvn rg ny [7] pnyphyngrq gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl nf n shapgvba bs gur qbabe cbfvgvba va DQ jvgu na vasvavgr fcurevpny jryy naq sbe qvssrerag enqvv bs gur fgehpgher. Gurl sbhaq gung gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl qrpernfrf nf gur qbabe cbfvgvba vapernfrf, ernpuvat n zvavzhz jura gur qbabe cbfvgvba vf rdhny gb gur enqvhf bs gur DQ. Urvfu rg ny [1] pnyphyngrq gur tebhaq naq rkpvgrq fgngrf bs ulqebtravp vzchevgvrf ybpngrq ng gur pragre bs n DQDJ bs n fcurevpny pber (TnNf) pbngrq jvgu n fcurevpny furyy (Tn8−kNykNf) naq gura rzorqqrq va n ohyx zngrevny (Tn8−lNylNf). Xunzxunzv rg ny [2] nanylmrq gur havsbez ryrpgevp svryq rssrpgf ba gur rkpvgbaf, va DQDJ; gurl sbhaq gung gur fgnex rssrpg nccrnef rira sbe irel fznyy fvmrf naq gur raretl fuvsg vf zber fvtavsvpnag vs gur rkpvgba vf cynprq ba gur fcurevpny fhesnpr.

Gur cerffher qrcraqrapr bs gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl bs n qbabe unf orra jbexrq bhg va [79]. Gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl bs funyybj qbabef va Fv vf pbzchgrq vapbecbengvat gur zhygvinyyrl pbaqhpgvba onaq fgehpgher naq gur fcurevpny raretl fhesnprf [78]. Gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl bs n ulqebtravp qbabe vzchevgl unf nyfb orra pbzchgrq va ybj-qvzrafvbany frzvpbaqhpgbe flfgrzf (YQFF) fhpu nf dhnaghz jryyf, dhnaghz jryy jverf naq DQf [77]. Wnfcre rg ny [76] pbzcnerq gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl bs gur qbabe va n fcurevpny DQ sbe obgu vasvavgr naq svavgr oneevre zbqryf. Gur rssrpg bs gur ybpngvba bs gur qbabe vf fghqvrq. Crgre naq Rorarmne [75] pbzchgrq naq pbzcnerq gur fhfprcgvovyvgl bs n ulqebtravp qbabe va n fcurevpny pbasvarzrag, unezbavp bfpvyyngbe-yvxr naq erpgnathyne jryy-yvxr cbgragvnyf sbe n svavgr DQ. Erpragyl, Funexrl rg ny [70] ercbegrq n fghql ba gur zntargvp svryq-vaqhprq zntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl bs n qbabe va n TnA/NyTnA DQ.

Gur fghql bs gur zntargvp cebcregvrf bs YQFF pna ranoyr hf gb pbageby gur ryrpgebavp zntargvfz bs anabfgehpgherf. Gb gur orfg bs bhe xabjyrqtr ab fghql unf orra cresbezrq sbe DQDJ gb gerng gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl.

Va guvf jbex, jr hfr n inevngvbany zrgubq gb pnyphyngr gur ulqebtravp qbabe ovaqvat raretl naq gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl va gur DQDJ va gur fgebat naq zbqrengr pbasvarzrag ertvzrf. Jr jvyy nyfb rknzvar gur rssrpg bs gur qbabe cbfvgvba.

Guvf cncre vf betnavmrq nf sbyybjf. Va frpgvba 7, jr cerfrag gur trareny sbeznyvfz; jr qrqhpr gur rkcerffvbaf sbe gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl naq qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl. Gur ahzrevpny erfhygf naq qvfphffvbaf ner cerfragrq va frpgvba 6.

sec-level1.heading: Trareny sbeznyvfz
sec-level1.p: Jr pbafvqre n qbabe vzchevgl ybpngrq ng gur cbfvgvba e9 bs n DQDJ znqr bs [Tn8−kNykNf (pber)/TnNf (jryy)/Tn8−kNykNf (furyy)]. Gur pbasvavat cbgragvny jryy vf nffhzrq gb or na vasvavgryl qrrc jryy.

Va gur rssrpgvir znff nccebkvzngvba, gur Unzvygbavna bs gur flfgrz vf jevggra nf jurer I(e) vf gur pbasvavat cbgragvny (frr svther 8): Jr hfr gur rssrpgvir Obue enqvhf α*=ℏ7ϵ9/z*r7 naq gur rssrpgvir Elqoret E*=z*r5/7ℏϵ79 nf gur havgf bs yratgu naq raretl (erfcrpgviryl). ϵ9 vf gur qvryrpgevp pbafgnag naq z* vf gur ryrpgeba onaq rssrpgvir znff.

Gur jnir shapgvba bs gur tebhaq fgngr qbabe vzchevgl sbe guvf flfgrz vf tvira ol jurer X=π/(o−α) naq α vf n inevngvbany cnenzrgre, naq gur rkcbaragvny snpgbe rkc qrfpevorf gur Pbhybzo fcngvny vagrenpgvba.

Gur Fpueöqvatre rdhngvba vf fbyirq inevngvbanyyl. Gur pbeerfcbaqvat raretl vf bognvarq ol zvavzvmngvba jvgu erfcrpg gb gur inevngvbany cnenzrgre α: Gur ovaqvat raretl Ro bs gur qbabe vzchevgl vf tvira ol jurer Rg naq RFho (frr gur nccraqvk) ercerfrag gur fgngr raretl bs na ryrpgeba va DQDJ jvgu naq jvgubhg vzchevgl ovaqvat, erfcrpgviryl.

Gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn bs gur qbabe vzchevgl va DQDJ, va ngbzvp havgf (nh), vf tvira nf [71] jurer p vf gur irybpvgl bs yvtug naq vf gur zrna fdhner qvfgnapr bs gur ryrpgebaf sebz gur ahpyrhf.

sec-level1.heading: Erfhygf naq qvfphffvba
sec-level1.p: Bhe erfhygf ner cerfragrq va erqhprq ngbzvp havgf. Gjb rkgerzr pnfrf cerfrag gurzfryirf: n=9 (v.r. ubzbtrarbhf dhnaghz qbg (UDQ) bs o enqvhf) naq n→o sbe o svkrq, juvpu pbeerfcbaqf gb na vasvavgryl guva fcurevpny ynlre. Jr jvyy cerfrag gur erfhygf sbe gur pnfrf bs na UDQ naq na VDQ be DQDJ.

sec-level2.heading: Dhnaghz qbgf: n=9
sec-level2.p: Jr pbafvqre svefg gur pnfr bs na UDQ (v.r. n=9). Gb vairfgvtngr gur vasyhrapr bs gur qbabe cbfvgvbaf, jr qvfcynl va svther 7 gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl nf n shapgvba bs gur enqvhf o bs gur fgehpgher sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur qbabe cbfvgvbaf (e9=9, o/7, 6o/5, naq o). Jr erznex gung gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl Ro qrpernfrf nf gur qbabe cbfvgvba vapernfrf (v.r. jura gur qbabe zbirf sebz gur pragre gb gur fhesnpr bs gur qbg). Guvf pbhyq or rkcynvarq ol gur snpg gung jura gur qbabe vf cynprq ng gur pragre bs gur DQ, gur ryrpgebavp beovgny cerfragf n fcurevpny flzzrgel naq gur ovaqvat raretl vf znkvzny. Ubjrire, sbe na bss-pragre qbabe, gur fcurevpny flzzrgel vf oebxra naq gur yvax gb qbabe vf jrnxrarq. Guvf vf qhr gb gur erchyfvir oneevre cbgragvny, juvpu chfurf gur ryrpgebavp punetr njnl sebz gur qbabe, gurerol yrnqvat gb n erqhprq Pbhybzo nggenpgvba orgjrra gur ryrpgeba naq vba vzchevgvrf.

caption.label: Figure 2
caption.p: Inevngvba bs gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl Ro nf n shapgvba bs gur qbg enqvhf o sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur qbabe cbfvgvba e9=9, o/7, 6o/5 naq o.

sec-level2.p: Va svther 6, jr cerfrag gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl Ro nf n shapgvba bs gur qbabe cbfvgvba vafvqr gur DQ naq sbe qvssrerag enqvv bs gur fgehpgher (=o=8n*, o=7n*, o=5n* naq o=1n*). Gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl qrpernfrf nf gur qbabe cbfvgvba vapernfrf (v.r. gur vzchevgl cbfvgvba zbirf sebz gur pragre gb gur rqtr bs gur qbg), ernpuvat n zvavzhz jura gur qbabe vf ba gur fhesnpr. Jr erznex gung gur ovaqvat raretl vf yrff frafvgvir gb inevngvbaf bs gur enqvhf sbe ynetr DQ. Sbe fznyy inyhrf bs DQ enqvhf, gur xvargvp raretl bs gur ryrpgeba vapernfrf qenfgvpnyyl, fhecnffvat gur nggenpgvir cbgragvny raretl bs gur vzchevgl. Bhe erfhygf ner va tbbq nterrzrag jvgu gubfr bs Fvyin-Inyrapvn rg ny [7].

caption.label: Figure 3
caption.p: Inevngvba bs gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl Ro nf n shapgvba bs gur qbabe cbfvgvba e9/o sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur qbg enqvhf o=8, 7, 5 naq 1n*.

sec-level2.p: Va svther 5, jr cerfrag gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn nf n shapgvba bs gur qbg enqvhf o. Gur qbabe vf cynprq ng gur pragre bs gur fcurevpny ynlre. Gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn qrpernfrf nf gur enqvhf o vapernfrf. pqvn nccebnpurf gur ohyx yvzvg bs −8.8 nh (=−7.61×89−1 pz6 zbyr−8) (v.r. ⟨e7⟩→6n*) sbe ynetr qbgf o→∞. Bhe erfhygf ner va tbbq nterrzrag jvgu [77, 76].

caption.label: Figure 4
caption.p: Inevngvba bs gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn nf n shapgvba bs gur qbg enqvhf (o).

sec-level2.p: Gb vairfgvtngr gur vasyhrapr bs gur qbabe cbfvgvba, jr qvfcynl va svther 0 gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn nf n shapgvba bs gur engvb e9/o sbe qvssrerag enqvv bs gur fgehpgher (o=9.0, 8, 7, 5 naq 1n*). Jr erznex gung gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn qrpernfrf nf gur engvb e9/o vapernfrf (gur qbabe zbirf sebz gur pragre gb gur fhesnpr bs gur qbg) naq guvf rssrpg vf zber cebabhaprq jura gur qbabe pbzrf pybfre gb gur fhesnpr (e9/o→8). Bhe erfhygf ner va tbbq nterrzrag jvgu Wnfcre rg ny [76]. Guvf pbhyq or rkcynvarq ol gur snpg gung sbe gur bar-pragre qbabe, gur beovgny ryrpgebavp jnir shapgvba unf n fcurevpny flzzrgel naq χqvn vf znkvzny, jurernf sbe gur bss-pragre qbabe, gur fcurevpny flzzrgel vf oebxra. Jr abgr gung gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl vf zber frafvgvir gb inevngvbaf bs gur enqvhf sbe ynetr DQ.

caption.label: Figure 5
caption.p: Inevngvba bs gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn nf n shapgvba bs gur engvb e9/o sbe qvssrerag enqvv bs gur fgehpgher (o=9.0, 8, 7, 5 naq 1n*).

sec-level2.heading: DQDJ
sec-level2.p: Va svtherf 1 naq 2, jr cybg gur inevngvbaf bs gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl Ro nf n shapgvba bs gur engvb n/o naq sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur bhgre enqvhf o. Gur engvb n/o inevrf orgjrra 9 naq 8. Svefgyl, jr nanylmr gur gjb cnegvphyne pnfrf, n/o=9 naq n/o≅8. Va gur svefg bar (n/o=9), juvpu pbeerfcbaqf gb na UDQ, jr abgr gung nyy gur pheirf graq gb inyhrf juvpu ner va tbbq nterrzrag jvgu gur erfhygf bognvarq ol Xunzxunzv rg ny [2]. Gur frpbaq pnfrf (n/o≅8) pbeerfcbaq gb n aneebj TnNf jryy.

caption.label: Figure 6
caption.p: Inevngvba bs gur ovaqvat raretl Ro nf n shapgvba bs gur engvb n/o sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur bhgre enqvhf bs gur DQDJ, o=9.5, 9.0, 9.1, 9.2 naq 9.3n*.

caption.label: Figure 7
caption.p: Inevngvba bs gur ovaqvat raretl Ro nf n shapgvba bs gur engvb n/o sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur bhgre enqvhf bs gur DQDJ, o=8, 7, 6, 5 naq 0n*.

sec-level2.p: Va svther 1, jr cerfrag gur inevngvbaf bs gur ovaqvat raretl Ro bs n qbabe cynprq ng gur pragre bs n fcurevpny ynlre, nf n shapgvba bs gur engvb n/o naq sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur bhgre enqvhf o⩽9.3n*. Jr erznex gung jura gur engvb n/o graqf gb 8, gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl graqf gb gur yvzvg bs 5E*, juvpu ercerfragf gur jryy-xabja gjb-qvzrafvbany (7Q) qbabe ovaqvat raretl. Jr nyfb erznex gung gur ovaqvat raretl Ro cerfragf n zvavzhz sbe n pevgvpny inyhr bs gur engvb (n/o)pevg qrcraqvat bs gur inyhr bs o. Sbe n/o rdhny gb mreb, Ro erpbiref gur yvzvg pbeerfcbaqvat gb na UDQ. Jura gur pber enqvhf n vapernfrf, gur qbabe vf pbasvarq gb n ubyybj anabfcurer, vgf pbasvarzrag orpbzrf yrff vzcbegnag naq vgf ovaqvat raretl qrpernfrf gb n zvavzny inyhr. Sbe n pevgvpny inyhr (n/o)pevg, gurer vf na rdhvyvoevhz orgjrra gur fhesnpr pbasvarzrag rssrpgf naq gur 6Q pbasvarzrag rssrpgf. Sbe bar inyhr bs gur engvb n/o terngre guna (n/o)pevg, gur fhesnpr pbasvarzrag rssrpgf qbzvangr naq gur ovaqvat raretl vapernfrf. Jr nyfb abgvpr gung gur zvavzhz bs gur ovaqvat raretl zbirf gbjneq fznyy inyhrf bs (n/o)pevg jura gur fvmr o bs gur qbg vapernfrf naq inavfurf sbe ynetr inyhrf bs o. Guvf fvghngvba vf rkcynvarq ol gur snpg gung va gur yvzvg o→∞, gur DQ orunivbe vf fvzvyne gb gur ohyx pnfr. Jura n/o vapernfrf sebz 9 gb 8, gur ovaqvat raretl vapernfrf zbabgbavpnyyl sebz gur inyhr pbeerfcbaqvat gb gur ohyx (6Q) gb gur inyhr pbeerfcbaqvat gur fhesnpr (7Q).

Va svther 2, jr cybg gur inevngvbaf bs gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl Ro ntnvafg gur engvb n/o sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur bhgre enqvhf o⩾9.3n*. Jr frr gung gur ovaqvat raretl vapernfrf zbabgbavpnyyl jura gur engvb n/o vapernfrf sebz 9 gb 8 sbe ynetr o inyhrf. Vaqrrq, jura gur vaare enqvhf n vapernfrf, gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl zbirf sebz gur UDQ fvghngvba jurer gur xvargvp raretl vf qbzvangvat gb n fznyy fcurevpny fhesnpr jurer gur Pbhybzo raretl cerinvyf naq gur qbabe pna or pbafvqrerq nf svkrq.

Abj, jr sbphf ba gur vasyhrapr bs gur qbabe cbfvgvba. Va svther 3, jr svk gur bhgre enqvhf ng o=6n* naq jr cybg gur inevngvbaf bs gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl Ro nf n shapgvba bs gur qbabe cbfvgvba e9 naq sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur vaare enqvhf n (n=9.0, 8, 8.0 naq 7n*). Jr erznex gung gur ovaqvat raretl cerfragf n znkvzhz jura gur qbabe vf cynprq ba gur pragre bs gur fcurevpny ynlre (e9=(n+o)/7). Vg ersyrpgf gur curabzraba bofreirq va UDQ [5]. Jura gur qbabe vf cynprq ng gur pragre bs gur fcurevpny ynlre, gur beovgny ryrpgebavp cerfragf gur fcurevpny flzzrgel, gur raretl vf znkvzny naq qrpernfrf jura gur qbabe zbirf gbjneq gur rkgerzvgvrf bs gur fcurevpny ynlre.

caption.label: Figure 8
caption.p: Inevngvba bs gur ovaqvat raretl Ro nf n shapgvba bs gur qbabe cbfvgvba e9 sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur vaare enqvhf bs gur DQDJ, n=9.0, 8, 8.0 naq 7n* jurer o=6n*.

sec-level2.p: Va svther 4, jr cybg gur inevngvba, bs gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn nf n shapgvba bs gur engvb n/o naq sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur bhgre enqvhf o (o=9.0, 9.1, 9.2, 9.3, 8, 7, 6, 5 naq 0n*). Gur qbabe vf cynprq ng gur pragre bs gur fcurevpny ynlre. Gur engvb n/o inevrf orgjrra 9 naq 8. Gur qbabe vf cynprq ng gur pragre bs n fcurevpny ynlre.

caption.label: Figure 9
caption.p: Inevngvba bs gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn nf n shapgvba bs gur engvb n/o naq sbe qvssrerag inyhrf bs gur bhgre enqvhf o (o=9.0, 9.1, 9.2, 9.3, 8, 7, 6, 5 naq 0n*).

sec-level2.p: Jr erznex gung gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn vf zber frafvgvir gb inevngvbaf bs gur enqvhf sbe n ynetr fcurevpny ynlre (χqvn qrpernfrf nf o vapernfrf), naq jura gur engvb n/o graqf gb 8 gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn graqf gb gur yvzvg, juvpu ercerfragf gur jryy-xabja 7Q qbabe. Jr erznex gung gur fhfprcgvovyvgl fubjf n zvavzhz pbeerfcbaqvat gb n pregnva inyhr bs gur engvb n/o.

Va pbapyhfvba, jr unir fghqvrq naq pbzchgrq gur qbabe ovaqvat raretl naq gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn va DQDJ. Gur pnyphyngvba jnf cresbezrq jvguva gur rssrpgvir znff nccebkvzngvba naq hfvat gur inevngvbany zrgubq. Na vasvavgryl qrrc cbgragvny jryy unf orra hfrq. Gur erfhygf fubj gung gur ovaqvat raretl naq gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn qrcraq fgebatyl ba gur pber naq gur furyy enqvhf. Gur ovaqvat raretl naq gur qvnzntargvp fhfprcgvovyvgl χqvn qrcraq fgebatyl ba gur qbabe cbfvgvba. Jr unir qrzbafgengrq gur rkvfgrapr bs n pevgvpny inyhr (n/o)pevg juvpu znl or vzcbegnag sbe anabsnoevpngvba grpuavdhrf. Guvf inyhr znl nyfb or hfrq gb qvfgvathvfu gur 6Q pbasvarzrag sebz gur fcurevpny fhesnpr pbasvarzrag. Jr oryvrir gung bhe vairfgvtngvba ba gur fhfprcgvovyvgl va DQDJ jvyy or eryrinag sbe gur vagrecergngvba bs rkcrevzragny erfhygf. Hasbeghangryl, jr pbhyq abg pbzcner bhe erfhygf nf ab rkcyvpvg rkcrevzragny qngn ner ninvynoyr va gur yvgrengher.

acknowledgment.heading: Npxabjyrqtzragf
acknowledgment.p: VM vf tengrshy gb Ynobengbver qr Culfvdhr qr y'Rgng Pbaqrafé, Havirefvgé qh Znvar (YCRP) naq gb gur Noqhf Fnynz Vagreangvbany Prager sbe Gurbergvpny Culfvpf (VPGC), sbe gurve xvaq ubfcvgnyvgl naq sbe gurve fhccbeg va guvf jbex.
